name: operaton/dmn-evaluator
description: WordPress Gravity Forms DMN Evaluator Plugin

scripts.mock:demo: php -r "require_once 'tests/fixtures/ExtendedMockDmnService.php'; require_once 'tests/helpers/MockServiceTestHelper.php'; use Operaton\DMN\Tests\Helpers\MockServiceTestHelper; \$helper = new MockServiceTestHelper(); \$report = \$helper->generateTestReport(); echo json_encode(\$report, JSON_PRETTY_PRINT);"
scripts.lint:fix: vendor/bin/phpcbf --standard=PSR12 includes/ operaton-dmn-plugin.php || echo 'Auto-fixed what was possible'
scripts.quality: composer run lint:summary && composer run security
scripts.quality:strict: composer run lint && composer run security
scripts.ci: composer run test:ci && composer run security
scripts.ci:full: composer run test:ci && composer run quality
scripts.format: composer run lint:fix && composer run lint:summary
scripts.check: composer run test && composer run quality
